score.label: PACE Score
score.explanationTitle: What does the PACE score mean?
score.explanationBody:
The PACE score is calculated from:
1. Target achievement rate
2. Income stability vs. fixed expenses
3. Whether you can sustain at least 3 months

A higher score indicates stronger structural stability.
Strategic choices depend on your situation.

msg.preparation: There is room if you reorganize your structure.
msg.strategic: A foundation for strategic moves is in place.

msg.preparation: A bit more design refinement will create room.
msg.strategic: You can design the direction you want.
msg.autonomy: Career choices are possible at this level.

fields.targetHelper: Required emergency fund for your target months
fields.runwayHelper: How many months you can sustain fixed expenses with current emergency fund
fields.progressHelper: Current emergency fund vs. target emergency fund
fields.lowestIncomeHelper: Conservative estimate of minimum monthly income (after tax recommended)
fields.fixedExpensesHelper: Costs you must pay every month.
fields.variableExpensesHelper: Costs that can be adjusted depending on situation.
fields.emergencyFundHelper: Total liquid assets you can use immediately.
fields.targetMonthsHelper: Set how many months of runway you want to build at current fixed expense level.
fields.incomeDayHelper: The date each month when income is deposited. Used as monthly cycle anchor.

strategy.title: Choose strategy
strategy.aTitle: What if you lighten expenses a bit?
strategy.aSub: ~{{reduction}} manwon less monthly · ~{{runwayDelta}} mo more runway
strategy.aExplanation:
Monthly spending drops by about {{reduction}} manwon.
Runway increases by about {{runwayDelta}} months.
strategy.bTitle: What if you build up your emergency fund a bit?
strategy.bSub: 500k added to emergency fund · ~{{runwayDelta}} mo more runway
strategy.bExplanation:
Runway increases by about {{runwayDelta}} months.
Target progress improves from {{progressBefore}}% to {{progressAfter}}%.
strategy.cTitle: What if you adjust both expenses and emergency fund?
strategy.cSub: ~{{reduction}} manwon less + 300k emergency fund · ~{{runwayDelta}} mo more runway
strategy.cExplanation: Monthly spending drops by about {{reduction}} manwon, runway increases by about {{runwayDelta}} months.
